pages.text: The Quiver can be worn in the chest armor slot. In addition to providing a small amount of protection to the wearer, it also provides unlimited $(item)Arrows$() for an equipped $(item)Bow$(). Fired arrows tend to travel much faster and cause extreme damage to airborne or jumping creatures. Additionally, hit creatures will also get the $(item)Weakness$() potion effect.

pages.title: Affinity
pages.text: Being close to another player wearing $(l:constructs/clothing/gulgs_gurdle)Gulg's Gurdle$(/l) grants a buff in $(item)Resistance$().
